鏵字的基本解释

鏵
huá
见“铧”。

鏵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huá］
［《廣韻》户花切，平麻，匣。］
亦作“鋘1”。“铧1”的繁体字。
(1)锹，一种人力翻土农具。
(2)铧式犁的主要部件之一，位于犁体的前方，有三角形、梯形两种，起入土和切开土垡的作用，并和犁壁构成犁体工作面以碎土翻土。

鏵字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鏵； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1321第10
【廣韻】戸花切【集韻】【正韻】胡瓜切，?音華。【玉篇】鍫也。【釋名】鍤，或作鏵。鏵刳地爲坎也。【揚子·方言】臿，宋魏之閒謂之鏵。【淮南子·精神訓·揭钁臿註】臿，鏵也。【集韻】與釫鋘同。

spade
Basic explanation of words
spade
huá
See "Hu".
spade
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [huá]
["Guangyun" household flower cut, flat hemp, box. ]
Also known as "鋘1". Traditional characters for "铧1".
(1) Shovel, a human-powered soil turning agricultural tool.
(2) One of the main components of the split plow is located in front of the plow body. There are two types of triangle and trapezoid. It plays the role of entering the soil and cutting the soil. It forms the working surface of the plow body with the plough wall to turn the soil.
spade
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　铧; Kangxi strokes: 20; Page number: Page 1321 and 10
[Guang Yun] 戸花切 [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Courgette cut,? Yinhua. 【Jade articles】鍫 also. 【Release name】锸, or as 铧. The land is kanye. 【Yangtze Dialect】Jian, Song Weizhi Xian is called Zhihua. 【Huainanzi·Spiritual Training·Jieqiuyu Note】Jian, Huaye. 【Jiyun】Same as Piaorong.
